verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou hast <S%H2713>searched<s%> me and <S%H3045>known<s%> [me.]
Thou dost <S%H3045>know<s%> when I <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> and when I <S%H6965>rise<s%> up; Thou dost <S%H995>understand<s%> my <S%H7454>thought<s%> from <S%H7350>afar.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H2219>scrutinize<s%> my <S%H734>path<s%> and my <S%H7250>lying<s%> <S%H7250>down,<s%> And art <S%H5532>intimately<s%> <S%H5532>acquainted<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
Even before <S%H369>there<s%> is a <S%H4405>word<s%> on my <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou dost <S%H3045>know<s%> it <S%H3605>all.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H6696>enclosed<s%> me <S%H268>behind<s%> and <S%H6924>before,<s%> And <S%H7896>laid<s%> Thy <S%H3709>hand<s%> upon me.
[Such] <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H6383>wonderful<s%> for me; It is [too] <S%H7682>high,<s%> I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> attain to it.
<S%H575>Where<s%> can I <S%H1980>go<s%> from Thy <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>? Or <S%H575>where<s%> can I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from Thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>?
<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H9368>ascend<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> Thou art <S%H8033>there;<s%> If I <S%H3331>make<s%> my <S%H3331>bed<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> Thou art there.
If I <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7837>dawn,<s%> If I <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H319>remotest<s%> <S%H319>part<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%>
<S%H1571>Even<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me, And Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> will <S%H270>lay<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of me.
If I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H389>"Surely<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> will <S%H7779>overwhelm<s%> me, And the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H1157>around<s%> me will be <S%H3915>night,<s%>"

<S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> is not <S%H2821>dark<s%> to Thee, And the <S%H3915>night<s%> is as <S%H215>bright<s%> as the <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H2825>Darkness<s%> and <S%H9004>light<s%> are alike [to Thee.]
For Thou didst <S%H7069>form<s%> my <S%H3629>inward<s%> <S%H3629>parts;<s%> Thou didst <S%H9360>weave<s%> me in my mother's <S%H990>womb.<s%>

I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, for I am <S%H3372>fearfully<s%> and <S%H6395>wonderfully<s%> made; <S%H6381>Wonderful<s%> are Thy <S%H4639>works,<s%> And my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> it <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3966>well.<s%>

My <S%H6108>frame<s%> was not <S%H3582>hidden<s%> from Thee, <S%H834>When<s%> I was <S%H6213>made<s%> in <S%H5643>secret,<s%> [And] <S%H7551>skillfully<s%> <S%H7551>wrought<s%> in the <S%H8482>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H1564>unformed<s%> <S%H1564>substance;<s%> And in Thy <S%H5612>book<s%> they were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3789>written,<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> that were <S%H3335>ordained<s%> [for me], When as yet there was not <S%H259>one<s%> of them.
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3365>precious<s%> also are Thy <S%H7454>thoughts<s%> to me, O <S%H410>God!<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H6105>vast<s%> is the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of them!
If I should <S%H5608>count<s%> them, they would <S%H7235>outnumber<s%> the <S%H2344>sand.<s%> When I <S%H9516>awake,<s%> I am <S%H5750>still<s%> with Thee.
<S%H518>O<s%> that Thou wouldst <S%H6991>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> O <S%H433>God;<s%> <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from me, therefore, <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1818>bloodshed.<s%>
For they <S%H559>speak<s%> against Thee <S%H4209>wickedly,<s%> And Thine <S%H6145>enemies<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> [Thy name] in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
Do I not <S%H8130>hate<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? And do I not <S%H6962>loathe<s%> those who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against Thee?
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> them with the <S%H8503>utmost<s%> <S%H8135>hatred;<s%> They have <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H340>enemies.<s%>
<S%H2713>Search<s%> me, O <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H3824>heart;<s%> <S%H974>Try<s%> me and <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8312>anxious<s%> <S%H8312>thoughts;<s%>
And <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there be any <S%H6090>hurtful<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in me, And <S%H5148>lead<s%> me in the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>
